title: My So-Called Life
description: Based on the critically acclaimed television show, this stand-alone novelboldly grapples with such vital teen issues as the price of popularity, substance abuse, and relationships in the age of AIDS. The loves, losses, andemotions of Angela Chase and her diverse group of friends are chronicled withthe same humor and sensitivity that have attracted a devoted teen following tothe TV series.https://openlibrary.org/books/OL77176...
author: Catherine Clark
